metadata.name: Golden Granny #1
metadata.description: Hello, my dears! 93 years in this world have given me many friends. I sent them a fax, and they all agreed to be embodied by these pretty NTFs. You might even recognize some of them...I don't understand a word but my nephew told me to say this so here it goes: Here's a collection of 10.000 Golden Grannys NFTs- unique digital collectibles living on the Ethereum blockchain. Your Golden Granny doubles as your Golden Grannys Club membership card, and grants access to members-only benefits.
